movie.title: I Still Believe
movie.description_intro: The true-life story of Christian music star Jeremy Camp and his journey of love and loss that looks to prove there is always hope.
movie.description_full: The true-life story of Christian music star Jeremy Camp and his journey of love and loss that looks to prove there is always hope.

movies.title: The Vanishing
movies.summary: Based on the Flannan Isle mystery. A small relief boat approaches a tiny, isolated island where a lighthouse is located. They're to replenish the stocks and replace the crew of 3. After they dock no one greets them. The winch is broken. The lamps are clean and refilled; the table's laid for dinner. There's an upturned chair, 2 sets of yellow oilskins are missing - the 3 men have vanished.
movies.description_full: Based on the Flannan Isle mystery. A small relief boat approaches a tiny, isolated island where a lighthouse is located. There's an upturned chair, 2 sets of yellow oilskins are missing - the 3 men have vanished.

movies.title: Wakefield
movies.summary: Howard has a loving wife (Garner), two daughters, a prestigious job as a Manhattan lawyer, and a comfortable home in the suburbs. But inwardly he's suffocating, and eventually he snaps and goes into hiding in his garage attic leaving his family to wonder what happened to him. He observes them from his window - an outsider spying in on his own life - as the days of exile stretch into months. Is it possible to go back to the way things were?

movies.title: Fantastic 4: Rise of the Silver Surfer
movies.title_english: Fantastic 4: Rise of the Silver Surfer
movies.title_long: Fantastic 4: Rise of the Silver Surfer (2007)
movies.summary: Everything seems to be going great for the Fantastic Four. Reed and Sue are finally getting married, and things couldn't seem better. However, when the mysterious Silver Surfer crashes things, they learn that they will have to deal with an old foe, and the powerful planet eating Galactus.
movies.description_full: Everything seems to be going great for the Fantastic Four. Reed and Sue are finally getting married, and things couldn't seem better. However, when the mysterious Silver Surfer crashes things, they learn that they will have to deal with an old foe, and the powerful planet eating Galactus.

movies.title: Jumper
movies.summary: David Rice is a high school student in Ann Arbor, abandoned by his mother at five, living with his callous, alcoholic father, enamored with Millie, a fellow student, and picked on by at least one classmate. On a winter's day, while about to drown, he discovers he can transport himself instantaneously to anyplace on earth. He runs away from home, goes to New York City, robs a bank vault, and comes to the attention of a shadowy group of government hunters. Eight years later, the hunters, led by the murderous Roland, get a fix on David. He heads home, searches out Millie, invites her to travel with him, and only later realizes that Roland and his crew are seriously deadly. Is everyone close to David in danger?
